reviewText: Sondra Abrahams was chosen by Our Lord to receive a huge message for us here on earth struggling with the whys and what fors.  This video is worth watching and keeping in your library of Videos and DVDs.  I understand that this story is also available on DVD if you can find it.  We all need to hear more of the truth that is withheld from us by the leaders of our faith. There is a terrible place called "hell" and no one should choose to go there!
